Are you having these cancerous foods? Feburary 04, 2017 1 /11 Cancer causing foods 
Cancer is one of the deadly diseases which is growing at a rapid pace. You'd be surprised to know that certain type of foods in our daily diet could actually be cancerous. According to the recent figures, 1 out of 10 cancers can be prevented with the right diet. Here we list top ten foods that should be completely eliminated from the diet. If starchy foods like bread and potatoes are cooked for too long or at high temperature, they produce a compound called acrylamide. This compound is also responsible for changing the colour of the food into golden. Overcooking can result in producing excess levels of acrylamide, which increases the risk of cancer. Many studies have proved that excessive consumption of alcohol is harmful to health and can be responsible for causing cancer. Heavy drinking damages the liver and increases scar tissues, which lead to lung cancer. The less alcohol you consume, the lower is your chance to develop cancer. According to Dr Vinay Bhardwaj, Head of Quantitative Health at Grow-fit, transfats are obtained after the extensive chemical treatment of vegetable oils.
